mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_ATTACH, BOARD_HITS, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_CODE_NO, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, MEMBER_NAME FROM BOARD JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE_NO = ${boardCodeNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_CODE_NAME FROM BOARD_CODE WHERE BOARD_CODE_NO = #{boardCodeNo}
SELECT BOARD_CODE_NAME FROM BOARD_CODE WHERE BOARD_CODE_NO = #{boardCodeNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_ATTACH, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NO
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN "BOARD_CODE" USING(BOARD_CODE_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE_NO = #{boardCodeNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
